title: TrainerDay + Intervals.Icu - Brings you affordable cycling training plan solutions.

transcript.full_text: today i'm going to show you how you can use trainer day in combination with intervals icu to give you all the calendar features that you would like to use for your cycling training and training plans hello this is alex from trainer day we help you amplify your health and cycling performance by utilizing simple evidence-based training principles let's get started here intervals icu provides you both calendaring and metrics i'm going to first connect to intervals icu so i come down here and i connect and i log in and i accept all that and now you can see i'm now connected to intervals icu and i have this one feature which is enable workout of the day and what that feature does is if you're using our training app or if you want to use our training app anything that you have planned on your intervals icu calendar which i'll show you here so i've got nothing planned i've only got what i've done you know what i've completed recently but i don't have any planned workouts but if i have something planned for today tomorrow the last couple days the next couple days it will actually show up in the training app on your training plan when you select this so i'll go ahead and select that then when i come to search workouts if i want to go to search workouts or my workouts in my library i can now say send to intervals icu and that just sent a specific work out there and it's it's interesting because it's instantaneous here you don't even have to refresh the page the workout just shows up automatically um and so you can see it here i didn't have that before so that's sending a work out there you also can send a training plan there so if i create a training plan and i have my own training plans i can click on one of those and this is two days a week i can say send to intervals i can unselect all i could just send one week if i want if i just want to send these two workouts or four week outs or however many when i want i can send those and i will send those and it defaults to next week you always have to send a complete week so so it's let's say it's on the 10th i'll go ahead and hit send plan and now if i come back to intervals now you can see my next week has got those two workouts on it those two planned workouts so then when i go to our training app and i open it and i'll show you a screenshot here when i open it you can see in here that i've got intervals in here as my training plan and i can see that my train my planned workouts and that's it thank you very much
